nodes.text: Secured Systems was a sector of Network Access, part of the Network Security District of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Eidolon Security maintained a datacenter in the area.
Secured Systems appears as part of Network Access on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
